channel.description: Recent content in math on lonerapier.xyz

item.title: Meromorphic Functions
item.description: Holomorhpic function (also known as Analytic function) usually refer to functions that are inifinitely differentiable. Formal Definition: Let G be an open set in $\mathbb{C}$.

item.title: Zeroes And Poles
item.description: In complex analysis, functions are studied that are differentiable (in the complex space) at almost all points. Zeroes and poles are very important concept.

item.title: Divisors
item.description: Definition of divisor of a rational function $z \in k(C)$: Degree of a divisor as $deg \space D = \sum_{P \in \mathbb{C^*}} n_p$

item.title: Elliptic Curve Pairings
item.description: [[ECC|Elliptic curves]] are used in cryptography mainly because of DLP i.e. itâ€™s infeasible to calculate $x$ from $X = Gx$.
